sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 77-2701 to 77-27,135
sections.text: 01, 77-27,222, 77-27,235, 77-27,236, and 77-27,238 to 77-27,242 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967.SourceLaws 1967, c. 487, ยง 1, p. 1533;Laws 1984, LB 1124, ยง 2;Laws 1985, LB 715, ยง 1;Laws 1985, LB 273, ยง 40;Laws 1987, LB

sections.heading: 77-2701 to 77-27,135.01, 77-27,222, 77-27,235, 77-27,236, and 77-27,238 to 77-27,242 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967
sections.text: 77-2701 to 77-27,135.01, 77-27,222, 77-27,235, 77-27,236, and 77-27,238 to 77-27,242 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967.

sections.heading: imposes a tax directly upon the licensee racetrack
sections.text: Section 77-2701 et seq. impose a sales tax upon the purchaser. Thus, section 77-2701 does not conflict with the provisions of section 2-1208 which prohibit any additional taxes from being imposed upon the licensee. Governors of Ak-Sar-Ben v. Depart
